channel.title: Elevenlabs on David's site

item.title: Time Blind AI
item.author: dawicks@gmail.com (David Wicks)
item.description: The Curious Case of the Time-Blind AI: Lessons from Building an ElevenLabs Agent Large language models (LLMs) are amazing, but they have a funny quirk: they don’t really understand the passage of time within a conversation. This became super clear when we were developing an AI agent with ElevenLabs. You can learn more about their product here: ElevenLabs conversational AI agents. I strongly suggest you check them out. It’s a pretty amazing service.
